Posts.Content: I agree it is your life ask make sure you are comfortable don't understand ask again
Posts.Title: So what advice do you have about my 'biopsy" or lack there of...

Posts.Content: I will share my experiences and knowledge. I remember being on one of these sites seven years ago couldn't believe how cheery and beyond joyful posting were I now understand that experience can give you a different look at what you are posting for newbies..... its scarey however no question or emotion should be denied, sometimes i still get alittle mad however it passes i am blessed to share so women after me have more tools and questions for their specialist.
Posts.Title: I will help anyone who wants to talk

Posts.Content: Call nurse navagator from your hospital. Try to sit down get a payment plan. With all the obama care and states running weird perhaps you qualify for state help. In some states they have 18 month cancer programs, it helps pay for doctor treatment, check into it. It doesn't pay for parking, gas, living expenes, also check into low drug plan for meds believe it or not AAA will give you a discount on some generic medications ASk everyone go to financial at doctors hopitals ask ask ask
Posts.Title: financial help

Posts.Content: i would seek another opinion any swelling ????
Posts.Title: Red Breast

Posts.Content: So this medication sounds like it may cause more pain and side effects what are the benefits? Are you taking it due to estrogen related cancer? There was not enough hydrocodone to make me take this for more then five weeks horrible headaches neck, joint, bone pain. I finally talked to oncologist he said if you can't take it you can't take it. history left partial mastecomy 18 lymphnodes, radiation, chemotherapy, then came lovely hormone therapy then came lymphedema most painful uncurable chronic condition from removing lymphnodes and radiating them. I didn't take arimidex i made it five six seven years now however my cancer is different i only tested positive for the first node of sentinel nodes second one was negative at the time i was told sometimes cancer skips a node so i let them take out 16 more 18 wrong move. Now they know a women who had same cancer and only two taken out is still alive and most likely doesn't have lymphedema which causes bactercia infections chronic daily challenges u lose more then half strength in arm and have so many affliciations forever
Posts.Title: ARIMIDEX NEW USER -PAIN

Posts.Content: Hi lyss96 thank you for sharing the advil sometimes we just don't know this information may save a life thank you. I am guessing the biopsy report is back by now. If it is true that your radiologist said 95% don't worry best thing you can do is love your mom. Spend some time laughing and doing fun things take her mind off of it. I pray you both are doing well

Posts.Content: Hi lyss96 thank you for sharing the advil sometimes we just don't know this information may save a life thank you. I am guessing the biopsy report is back by now. Posts.Title: Breast Cancer help...

Posts.Content: First find a nurse navaigator they will have alot of good information. If you do not have insurance most states have programs that will let's say get you treatment however be careful that is all they do. So reach out find women ask ask ask, alot of expensives will arise. Support group in person or at hospital is good. Online information is good however you can over load your self with trying to understand exactly what is happening to you. I say experience find women who have been threw it recently not 15 yrs ago your oncologist may help you find this person it really helps.
Posts.Title: Insurance questions how will you pay for treatment?

Posts.Content: Cancer can be smelled some people more sensitive and sometimes if you have smelled it before for example dogs you will never forget it well its 2008 i am alittle late hope all is well
Posts.Title: Cancer smell

Posts.Content: I am so sorry sideheaven please keep us posted on all other outcomes.
Posts.Title: What next....

Posts.Content: Interesting I shall ask for a sonogram if it is available to me.
Posts.Title: ultrasound for breast cancer!

Posts.Content: Lisa time has passed hopefully you have healed alot you were put threw some really hard challenges. The first three years or so are hard it is always on your mind so find some friends and family members go enjoy new activities. Join breast cancer support group with women your age. Most of all don't let all negativity out here get to you. I know every women has different cancer each person is unique. Live now!
Posts.Title: Beyond treatment

Posts.Content: Good question I have really dense breasts I was so blessed that my radiologist saw a slight need to have me come in and do a ultra sound and that is how my cancer was found. I advise women especially large or history.

Posts.Title: Beyond treatment

Posts.Content: Try to get all your dental care done before chemotherapy and meds. It is know to cause tooth decay loss. Biotene mouthwash is expensive but has enzymes that help keep your mouth hydrated.
